item.title: 4 1/2 apartment NDG Charming Upper Duplex - Heated / Chauffé
item.address: Montreal, QC, Canada, H4V 1T9
item.description: Address: Montreal, QC, Canada, H4V 1T9 4 1/2 à NDG au 2ème étage d’un duplex (très privé) <br />Disponible: le 1er juillet 2015 <br /> <br />Prix: 1,185$/mois (frais de chauffage inclus dans le loyer) <br />Inclus: tous les électroménagers de très bonne qualité. <br /> <br />Condo rénové au goût du jour. <br /> <br />À proximité des bus et à 10 min des métros: Villa-Maria et Vendôme et de tous les services: Épiceries, Écoles, banques, restaurants et de la rue Monkland. <br />Proche du CLSC et du centre sportif NDG. <br />A quelques minutes du nouveau MUHC. <br /> <br />Surface: 1050 pc. (voir le plan). Deux chambres à coucher et une salle à manger. <br />Balcon arrière qui donne une vue sur le jardin et au voisinage tranquille. <br />Beaucoup de fenêtres. <br /> <br />Inclus: <br /> <br />- Tous les électroménagers: four, frigo et lave-vaisselle. <br />- Salle de lavage situé au sous-sol (équipement neuf sans aucun frais supplémentaire) dans l’immeuble partagé avec le 1er étage seulement. <br />- Stationnement dans la rue très facile. <br /> <br />N’hésitez pas à m’appeler pour des questions. <br /> <br />Merci - Georges / cell: 514-691-0008 <br /> <br />________________ <br /> <br />4 1/2 in NDG - in a Duplex - upper level <br />Will be available for occupancy: July 1st 2015 <br /> <br />Price: $ 1,185/month (heating cost is included in the rent) <br />Included: all appliances <br /> <br />Beautiful renovated condo in very good condition. <br /> <br />Close to buses & 10 min from metros: Villa Maria and Vendome stations. <br />Also very close (walking distance) from Sherbrooke and Univ. of Concordia, Loyola Campus. <br />Close to many services - such as: schools, grocery stores, banks and Monkland village. <br /> <br />Area: 1050 sq.ft. 2 bedrooms + seperate dinning room - see plans. <br />Rear balcony and lots of windows. <br /> <br />Included: <br /> <br />- All appliances: stove, large fridge and dish washer. <br />- Laundry room is in the basement (new equipment) is shared only with the lower condo. <br />- Parking in the street and is very easy in front of the duplex. <br /> <br />Feel free to call if you have questions. - Georges / cell: 514-691-0008

item.title: CHAUFFÉ ET ÉLECTROS ● 8 MIN DE MARCHE DU MÉTRO OUTREMONT
item.address: 590 Avenue Outremont, Montreal, QC, Canada, H2V 3M6
item.description: Address: 590 Avenue Outremont, Montreal, QC, Canada, H2V 3M6 <p>3 1/2 au coin des avenues Outremont et Bernard, dans un quartier plein de vie à 8 minutes de marche du métro Outremont (ligne bleue). Près de: Cote-des-Neiges (C-D-N), Plateau Mont-Royal, Mile-End, Petite Italie. Campus : Université de Montréal / University of Montreal (UdeM), HEC, Polytechnique, McGill, UQAM.<br />* Planchers de bois franc<br />* Ascenseur dans l’immeuble<br />* Espaces de rangement disponibles<br />* Salle de lavage dans l’immeuble<br />Loyer mensuel à partir de 975$ incluant:<br />- Chauffage et eau chaude<br />- Réfrigérateur et cuisinière<br />Emplacement:<br />* Accès rapide à : Université de Montréal, HEC, Polytechnique, McGill, UQAM, centre-ville, marché Jean-Talon, Plateau & Mile-End<br />* Près de tous les services (épicerie, pharmacie, Bilboquet,  transports en commun, garderies, Bagel St-Viateur, etc.)<br />* À proximité : Théâtre d’Outremont, bibliothèques, Théâtre Rialto, etc.<br />* Avenue Bernard : restaurants, boutiques, cafés, et plus.<br />* Entouré de 6 parcs, dont le superbe parc St-Viateur<br />Téléphonez-nous pour plus d’informations ou pour visiter!</p>

item.description: Address: 590 Avenue Outremont, Montreal, QC, Canada, H2V 3M6 <p>À 8 minutes de marche du métro Outremont (blue line / ligne bleue)<br />4 1/2 (demi sous-sol) situé sur l’Avenue Outremont au coin de Bernard, dans un quartier vivant.<br /><br />À Outremont près de Cote-des-Neiges (CDN), Plateau Mont-Royal, Mile-End, Centre-ville (downtown), Petite Italie, Université de Montréal / University of Montreal (UdeM), HEC, Polytechnique, McGill, UQAM.</p>Cuisine complètement rénovéeRéfrigérateur, cuisinière et LAVE-VAISSELLE inclusChauffage et eau chaude inclusPlanchers de bois francAscenseur dans l’immeubleSalle de lavage dans l’immeubleEspaces de rangement disponiblesPrès de tous les services (épicerie, pharmacie, Bilboquet,  transports en commun, garderies, etc.)Avenue Bernard : restaurants, boutiques, cafés, et plus.Divertissement à proximité : Théâtre d’Outremont, bibliothèques, Théâtre Rialto, etc.Entouré de 6 parcs, dont le superbe parc St-Viateur<p>Appelez-nous pour plus d’informations ou pour organiser une visite.<br />(Les photos et la vidéo sont celles de l’appartement réel.)<br />~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~<br />8-minute walk to Outremont Metro (blue line)<br />4 ½ semi-basement located on Outremont Avenue at the corner of Bernard in a dynamic neighborhood.</p>Completely renovated kitchenRefrigerator, stove and DISHWASHERHeating and hot water includedHardwood floorsElevator in the buildingLaundry facilities in the buildingLocker spaces availableClose to all amenities (grocery store, drugstore, Bilboquet, daycare, bus and metro routes)Entertainment nearby : Outremont Theatre, libraries, Rialto TheatreTrendy Bernard Avenue : restaurants, shops, cafés, and moreClose to 6 green spaces, including the marvelous St-Viateur park<p>Call for more info or to schedule a visit<br />(Photos and virtual visit video are of the actual unit.)</p>

item.title: 4 1/2 en face métro ed-montpetit /all included Juin-Juillet-Aout
item.address: Montreal, QC, Canada, H2V2C8
item.description: Address: Montreal, QC, Canada, H2V2C8 (( ENGLISH WILL FOLLOW )) <br /> <br />Bonjour, <br />Je sous-loue un 4 1/2 avec deux chambres fermées ( à la base il y a 3 chambres mais une sera fermé et inaccessible ) sur Edouard-Montpetit pour les mois de Juin, Juillet et Août. <br />Le prix est de 750$ par mois tout inclus : chauffage, eau chaude, électricité et internet haut débit. <br />Il s'agit 2 chambres fermées et bien meublés (dont une avec un balcon) d'une salle de bain et d'une cuisine équipée d'ustensiles, de micro ondes, mixeur, plaque de cuisson etc... La cuisine dispose aussi d'une toute petite chambre avec une laveuse et sécheuse. <br />L'appart est situé en face du métro Edouard-Montpetit et de l'arrêt du bus 51 et 119, à 2-3min du cepsum, HEC et UdeM et a 3 min de l'arrêt de bus 129 qui mène directement au centre ville <br /> <br />Contactez-moi par text, mail : gocu_08@msn.com ou appeler le 514 298 3445 pour plus d'informations. <br /> <br />ENGLISH : <br /> <br />Hello, <br />I sub-leases a 4 1/2 with two closed bedrooms (there are 3 bedrooms but the smallest one will be closed and inaccessible) on Edouard-Montpetit for the months of June, July and August. <br />The price is $ 750 per month all included: heating, hot water, electricity and Internet. <br />It is 2 big bedrooms closed and fully furnished (one with a balcony), a bathroom and a kitchen with cooking utensils, micro wave oven, blender, hob etc ... The kitchen has also a tiny room with a washer and dryer. <br />The apartment is located next to the metro Edouard-Montpetit and the bus 51 and 119, in 2-3min CEPSUM, UdeM and HEC and 3 minutes from the bus stop 129 that leads directly to the city center. <br /> <br />For more informations, please text or call this number : 514 298 3445 or email me : gocu_08@msn.com

item.title: 4.5 Luna Apartments NEAR MCGILL AND CONCORDIA
item.address: 1100 Avenue Docteur Penfield, Montreal, QC, Canada, H3A 1X1
item.description: Address: 1100 Avenue Docteur Penfield, Montreal, QC, Canada, H3A 1X1 J'ai une appartment 4.5 dans Luna Appartments pour louer Août ou Juillet. (1100 ave. Docteur Penfield). C'est très grand, est la salon peut transformer à une chambre! 2 toilettes et 2 chambres. Parfait pour les étudiants McGill University (>5min) ou Concordia University (10-15 min). C'est 24 heures gym, déppaneur, buanderie, et salon. C'est Subway aussi. Luna appartments a wifi gratuit aussi dans ces places. L'administration est très gentile et poli aussi! <br /> <br />I have an apartment 4.5 in Luna Apartments to lease transfer for August/July (1100 ave. Docteur Penfield). There is a big room and a small room, and the living room can be transformed into a bedroom. It's perfect for McGill and Concordia students because it's fairly close! There's a 24 hours gym, Jean-Coutu, laundry room and lounge with free Wifi. There's a Subway sandwiches, if you're hungry. The administration is super nice and polite too!

item.title: Carte Cadeau GRATUIT! Belle vue-récemment rénové-piscine et g
item.address: 2125 Rue Saint-Marc, Montreal, QC, Canada, H3H 2P1
item.description: Address: 2125 Rue Saint-Marc, Montreal, QC, Canada, H3H 2P1 <p>McGill, Concordia, LaSalle et Dawson sont tous à distance de marche de votre nouvelle adresse. Nouvellement rénové, ce bel appartement est encore plus attrayant qu’avant. Vous apprécierez le grand espace de vie et les améliorations apportées, comme le plancher de bois franc et la céramique dans la salle de bains. Ajoutez une piscine, un gym et un sauna et vous ne voudrez plus quitter ce nouveau style de vie! <br /><br />2125, rue Saint-Marc | Appartement 3½ à partir de 1275$<br />Rue Sherbrooke O & rue Guy <br /></p><p>Avez-vous la fièvre du printemps? Emménagez d’ici le 1er juin et recevez une carte-cadeau de 1000 $*<br />*Certaines conditions s’appliquent</p><p><br /></p><p>Appelez-nous aujourd'hui (514) 545-2641</p><p>Votre demeure:</p>Grande pièces avec cuisine nouvellement rénovée munie d’un grand comptoir avec espaces de rangementNouveaux électroménagers inclus : réfrigérateur, cuisinière et lave-vaisselleNouveaux luminaire et meuble de salle de bainNouvelle fenestration et balcon dans la plupart des appartementsÉlectricité, chauffage, eau chaude inclus<p><br />Notre immeuble:<br /></p>Gardien de sécurité 7 jours par semaine (de 20h à 6h)Accès au lobby avec puceCaméras de sécurité surveilléesBuanderie rénovée sur placeEspaces communs récemment rénovéesNouvelle salle de gym entièrement équipéeÉquipe de gestion professionnelle sur placePiscine intérieure, sauna, terrain de squashStationnement intérieur disponible (140 $ par mois)<p>Le voisinage offre:</p>Situé au cœur du centre-ville de MontréalÀ seulement quelques pas de tout ce que le centre-ville de Montréal a à offrir, comme les boutiques, les spectacles, les restaurants et plus encore.À distance de marche de McGill, Concordia, LaSalle et DawsonLe transport en commun est au seuil de votre porte -  métro Guy- ConcordiaLe Parc du Mont- Royal et du Vieux-Montréal sont à quelques minutes<p>Composez le (514) 545-2641 pour prendre rendez-vous.</p><p>Les photos représentent une unité semblable à l’unité décrite ici.</p>

item.title: Grand Loft Meublé - Vieux Montreal
item.address: Montreal, QC, Canada, H2Y 2K9
item.description: Address: Montreal, QC, Canada, H2Y 2K9 Situé sur la prestigieuse rue Sainte-Hélène, ce loft du Vieux-Montréal est parfait pour des gens moderne et dynamique! <br /> <br />Bordée de 3 grandes fenêtres, la pièce est très vaste et lumineuse, elle est surtout parfaitement agencé puisque l'espace chambre est dans un den distinct de l'espace de vie. Par ailleurs, chaque meuble a été selectionné avec goût, les matériaux sont de qualité et la grande cuisine donne sur le salon. <br /> <br />Vous disposerez aussi d'une belle terrasse sur le toit, profitant ainsi du soleil et de la vue sur le Vieux-Montréal! <br /> <br />Immeuble très paisible et silencieux. Les reglements de la copropriété sont assez stricts sur le bruit afin de maintenir une atmosphère sécuritaire et paisible pour les résidents. Vous profiterez donc d'un environnement silencieux au milieu d'un des quartiers les plus dynamiques de Montreal. <br /> <br />Emplacement: <br />433 rue Sainte-Hélène, Vieux Montréal, H2Y 2K9 <br />Le loft est parfaitement situé à mi-chemin entre la Station Square Victoria et la Promenade du Vieux Port (5min à pied). <br />Vous vivrez entourés de petites boutiques et de restaurants gastronomiques dans un quartier pavé de charme et d'histoire. <br />Transports : Station Square Victoria, Bus (61, 75, 36, 28, 168), accès rapide à l'autoroute Bonaventure. <br /> <br /> <br />Inclus : <br />-Appareils ménagers : Frigo, cuisinière et four, lave-vaisselle, laveuse/sécheuse <br />-Meubles : Canapé en cuir, table à manger, lit queen, tiroirs, lit simple, linge de maison, ustensiles de cuisine, télé LCD <br />- Possibilité d'avoir les utilitaires inclus pour un montant supplémentaire.

item.description: Address: 4166 Rue Saint-Denis, Montreal, QC, Canada, H2W 2M5 (English below) <br />Inclus chauffage, électricité et eau chaude. <br /> <br />Bel appartement à aire ouverte entièrement meublé situé au dernier étage (3e). 2 chambres fermées avec salon, salle à manger et cuisine à aire ouverte. Les portes-patio du salon s'ouvrent sur un privé balcon surplombant la rue St-Denis. Un deuxième balcon à l'arrière. <br /> <br />Le salon est équipé d'un système de cinéma maison, d'un sofa à 3 places et d'un fauteuil, et d'une table à diner extensible avec 5 chaises. <br /> <br />La cuisine est toute équipée et vous offre une cuisinière avec hotte, réfrigérateur, four micro-onde, ainsi qu'une cafetière. Évier double. Inclus tous les ustensiles, la vaisselle, pots, casseroles, épices, etc. . . <br /> <br />Une chambre à coucher avec balcon donnant sur la cour intérieure arrière. Inclus un lit Queen, 2 tables de nuit, et 2 tiroirs de rangement, et 2 garde-robes. <br /> <br />Une deuxième chambre fermée sert de bureau et salle d'entraînement (gym), et inclus un sofa à 2 places et une machine d'exercice elliptique. Cette chambre peut facilement être convertie en deuxième chambre à coucher selon vos besoins. <br /> <br />Une place de stationnement privée se trouve à l'arrière de l'immeuble. <br /> <br />Une laveuse et sécheuse communes sont situées au premier étage de l'immeuble. <br /> <br />Sous-location de janvier à juin (flexible). Chats acceptés. <br /> <br />Pour visiter, veuillez appeler au 514-808-7238. <br /> <br /> <br />Includes heating, electricity and hot water. <br /> <br />Beautiful apartment fully furnished open area on the top floor (3rd). 2 bedrooms with living room, dining room and open kitchen. The patio doors from the lounge open onto a private balcony overlooking the St-Denis. A second balcony at the back. <br /> <br />The living room is equipped with a home theater system, a 3-seater sofa and an armchair, and an extendable dining table with 5 chairs. <br /> <br />The kitchen is fully equipped and offers a cooker with hood, refrigerator, microwave oven and coffee maker. Double sink. Includes all the utensils, dishes, pots, pans, spices, etc. .dropoff Window .dropoff Window <br /> <br />One bedroom with balcony overlooking the rear courtyard. Includes a Queen bed, 2 night tables, and 2 drawers and 2 wardrobes. <br /> <br />A second closed bedroom used as an office and exercise room (gym), and includes a 2-seater sofa and an elliptical exercise machine.

item.description: Address: 53 Windmill Road, Halifax Regional Municipality, NS, Canada, B3A 1C6 Tired of looking at the same old apartments? Look no further! item.description: Address: 9 Royal Court, Charlottetown, PE, Canada, C1A 8M7 Available immediately. Spacious, quiet, clean 2 bedroom apartments for rent at Royal Court. Freshly painted. We have some apartments that have a washer and dryer hook-up inside the apartment. The main building has coin operated laundry in the lower level. We have multi-cultural residents at Royal Court, with many seniors and people who have been here over 5 years. We will consider allowing quiet house dogs who have been with you for over 2 years. No puppies are to be in our buildings, and any dog will have to do a meet and greet with Nora Bagnall. item.title: : 1991 Brunswick Street, 1BR
item.address: Halifax Regional Municipality, NS, Canada, B3J 3L8
item.description: Address: Halifax Regional Municipality, NS, Canada, B3J 3L8 Apartment for Rent in Halifax<br/><br/>Key Property Details<br/>At the Heart of the Harbour District!Heated Indoor Swimming Pool, Sauna, & Fitness Centre!Restaurants, Markets, & Shopping Close by!<br/>Property Features<br/>BalconyCable ReadyElevatorFitness CenterFridge / StoveLaundry RoomOn Site ManagementParkingPoolSaunaSecurity CamerasSecurity PatrolsStorageWasher / Dryer<br/>Detailed Property Information<br/>From the heart of the city’s most sought-after district, everything downtown Halifax has to offer is within easy walking distance of Halifax Apartments —a cluster of three quality rental apartments at the heart of the Harbour district. <br> <br> Sizes range from one-bedroom to three-bedroom suites. Fully furnished suites are available at The Plaza. <br> <br> Halifax Apartments offers appealing amenities like an indoor swimming pool, hot tub and sauna, a fully equipped fitness centre, mini mart, gourmet gift shop, business centre and a pizzeria, as well as direct indoor access to the pedway. <br> <br> Natural light streams in through the glass enclosure around the indoor pool. Get in a workout, or just splash around to relax and re-energize. To take your relaxation one step further, try the sauna or the whirlpool. <br> <br> The fitness centre has everything you need to stay in shape—weights, treadmills, elliptical machines, stationary bikes and more. Lockers and showers are available. <br> <br> Spend the afternoon in your favourite lawn chair on the deck, or catch the sunset over the Harbour. <br><br>The Halifax Harbour area is the cultural centre of this lively city, and Halifax Apartments is at its heart, making it easy for you to take full advantage of this ideal location. Restaurants to suit all tastes and budgets, museums, historic sites, markets and shopping—even a casino—are all within a few minutes’ walk. The sun and salt air, the fresh breezes, the boardwalk, the nearby beaches: the sights and sounds of this vibrant district will fill your senses. <br/><br/><br/>Additional Property Information<br/>PoolWhirlpoolSaunaFitness centreRooftop deck and patioUnderground parkingSecurity system and regular building patrols are a reassuring presenceStaff are on call 24 hours a day to respond to residents’ needsAmple storage areasIn-suite laundryPropane fireplacesPrivate balconiesHardwood and vinyl tile flooring

item.title: Yaletown 1 bd 1 bath condo available May 1st
item.address: 1088 Richards Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6B 3E1
item.description: Address: 1088 Richards Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6B 3E1 This spectacular one bedroom one bath condo unit is located in the heart of Yaletown. It is close to amenities such as the Yaletown-Roundhouse Canada Line stop, sushi, thai, and noodle shops, a neighborhood dog park, seawall, Roundhouse Community Center, soccer park, library, and coffee shops. This is a perfect place for a Masters student, a working professional, a young couple, or someone who needs a short term place to live. This is a central location for public transportation commuters to hop on the Canada Line to connect to bus routes at Olympic Village, King Edward, and Oakridge Centre. <br />The Richards Living is a modern condo development built by Aquilini Developments. The building is 3 years old with modern interior look and a brownstone exterior mixed with green landscaping. It truly has a natural Westcoast feel. The condo is fully furnished with a classic modern look and it has been acclaimed by Vancouver Magazine as one of the best places to stay. All the previous tenants were thrilled as it met their expectations for quality and comfort. <br />The condo is furnished with a queen size bed, dining table, double wardrobe storage unit, wooden hangers, leather couch, smart tv, and coffee table. Everyday basics such as towels, ironing board, iron, microwave, toaster, butcher’s board, and laundry basket are included in the rent. The kitchen comes fully stocked with essentials if you plan to cook and stay in. The building includes a gym, a garden terrace, a car wash bay, recycling and garbage area, bike rooms, and pick up area. A private or personalized display can be set up on the front and rear entrance intercoms of the building. <br />If you are interested in making an appointment to view the suite, please contact Sophia at 778-838-1100 or sophia.fu4@gmail.com. It is available for move-in on May 1st.

item.description: Address: 17404 64 Avenue NW, Edmonton, AB, Canada, T5T 6X4 In quiet, suburban, upscale neighborhood of Callingwood. This stunning top floor apartment is a 5 minute walk away from sushi, high end italian, a european deli, Starbucks, pilates studio, Safeway, Cobs Bread, ice cream, movies and much more! <br /> <br />The Marketplace at Callingwood is just a few steps away and has every amenity you can think of including a Farmers Market every Wednesday and Sunday Spring through fall, featuring locally grown organic veggies and meats. <br /> <br />The YMCA, the Library, a ravine, many parks...all within walking distance. Finally a high end, executive furnished rental that's in a family neighborhood, not downtown or party central Whyte Avenue! <br /> <br />Come home to this very modern, very trendy, fully furnished Executive Apartment. The modern, open design, beautiful dark hardwood floors (yes, REAL hardwood!!), the european kitchen with bar and the large bright windows throughout all come together to make this home a haven. This bright and cheery place is exceptional for its lighting. If you're looking for lifestyle, without the party, this is the place - come home to luxury. <br /> <br />Sorry, no pets. <br /> <br />If you are seeing this ad, it means it is still available, no need to confirm this with us. Please contact me direct at admin@albertaonfire.com for any additional questions. <br /> <br />Some extras to take note of; <br />- This unit is a one bedroom PLUS den <br />- This unit is furnished and does not come with the option to rent it unfurnished.

item.title: Bachelor Downtown Large (May 1st or June 1st) - Pet Friendly
item.address: 560 Needham Street, Fredericton, NB, Canada, E3B 1P3
item.description: Address: 560 Needham Street, Fredericton, NB, Canada, E3B 1P3 ▪️This large Bachelor apartment is located Downtown at 560 Needham Street. It is on the second floor in the middle of the house. It is available for May 1st or June 1st. The natural gas heat and hot water are included. $645<br /><br />▪️You enter the apartment through the bedroom/living room. The bedroom and living room are combined into one good size room. This room has 2 windows to give you a reasonable amount of natural light. One window is on the steel insulated door leading to the fire-escape/deck, and one window faces the driveway, and backyard. This room has an indoor/outdoor carpet. The fire-escape was made extra wide so it could be used as a small deck off the bedroom/living room. You could put a small BBQ or a couple chairs on it. The kitchen area is in a long "L" shape. It will fit a small table with chairs. The kitchen has a reasonable amount of cabinets for your dishes, pots, and pans. It comes with a full size frost-free fridge and a full size stove. The kitchen has a window facing the driveway. It has ceramic tile floors. The breaker panel is located in the kitchen. The big bathroom has no bathtub but it does have a shower. It has a window facing the backyard of the house next door. The bathroom has ceramic tile floors.<br /><br />▪️560 Needham Street is a 5 unit, 2 and a half storey house converted into apartments in the Downtown core of Fredericton. Some of the electrical was upgraded in recent years. The house has a new environmentally friendly hi-efficiency natural gas forced-air furnace from Enbridge Gas New Brunswick. All of the apartments at this location have their natural gas heat, and hot water included. There is plenty of paved parking on the side, and especially at the back of the house. It is on the bus route. The snow removal, and the lawn care maintenance are included.<br /><br />▪️The coin-operated Laundry Room is passcode secured. It is open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week for your convenience. The Laundry Room has 2 GE commercial washers and 2 GE commercial dryers at only a $1.50 each. It is located on the driveway side of 560 Needham Street. The Laundry Room was repainted last summer, and received a new ceramic tile floor 2 years ago.<br /><br />▪️You get a 5 Year Rent Guarantee that your rent will stay the same for 5 years. A lease is required from May 1st or June 1st, 2015 until August 31st, 2015. Cats and dogs are allowed at all of our locations for an extra charge. If you choose to bring a cat with you it is $25 per month per cat. If you choose to bring a dog with you it is $45 per month per dog.<br /><br />▪️The Security Deposit is the same as one month's rent. For example, if your rent is $645 then your Securit

item.title: The Juliana - 2 Bedroom Apartment for Rent
item.address: 100 Bronson Avenue, Ottawa, ON, Canada, K1R 6G8
item.description: Address: 100 Bronson Avenue, Ottawa, ON, Canada, K1R 6G8 <p>Upscale apartment living in downtown Ottawa! Why pay condo fees, utilities and property taxes when you can rent a spacious luxury suite at The Juliana? This prestigious, well-appointed property is just a short walk from Parliament Hill and the best shopping, dining and arts venues Ottawa has to offer.</p><p>Live carefree-- let us take care of the maintenance at this elegant apartment building. Take advantage of the beautiful penthouse residents' lounge and rooftop terrace with striking views of the city, Ottawa River and Gatineau Hills. Choose from our standard or upgraded suites! These suites offer large windows, modern appliances including a dishwasher, and eat-in kitchens. Most 2 bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms and in-suite laundry, sunrooms or two balconies. Other features include new ceramic tile, gorgeous cabinetry and gleaming hardwood flooring. For your convenience, the heat, water and air conditioning are included in the monthly rent.</p><p>Dedicated on-site staff provide excellent service in this secure building. Spend your time relaxing at home or exploring the culture and nightlife just minutes from your doorstep. This building is part of the Certified Rental Building (CRB) Program, which ensures peace of mind. Make your home in this exceptional apartment building. Call our Ottawa Rental Centre today to book your personal tour!</p><br />Utilities Included:<br />HeatWater<br />Amenities<br />Air conditioningAssigned parkingBalconiesBicycle racksCable readyCeramic floorsCity viewsDishwasher Available (select suites)Eat-in kitchen (most suites)ElevatorsEnsuite bathroomFridgeHardwood floorsIn-suite washer dryer (select suites)Individual thermostatsInternet readyKeyless entryLarge, bright suitesLaundry facilitiesOn-site staffOutdoor parkingOversized balconiesParks nearbyPublic transitRiver views (select suites)Rooftop terraceSchools nearbyShopping nearbyStoveSunroom (select suites)Top floor loungeTwo balconies (select suites)Video surveillanceView of Gatineau Hills (select units)Visitor parkingWalk-in Closests (select suites)

(No stairs to climb) <br />No smoking or dogs allowed. <br />Large, convenient pantry/storage area off the kitchen. <br />Deck with railing for BBQ or sitting area. <br />Rent is $1,350.00 / month and includes all condo fees and one parking stall. <br /> <br />Please e-mail or call if interested.

Hydro is extra. <br /><br />Available February 1. Now showing by appointment.

item.title: 2 Bed 2 bath condo at The Westerly, Kitsilano
item.address: 2528 Collingwood Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6R 2K2
item.description: Address: 2528 Collingwood Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6R 2K2 Hi there, <br /> <br /> I am renting out my 770 sq ft 2 bedroom 2 bathroom condo. The building itself is a brand new (less than 6 months old) low-rise building in the hear of Westside Kitsilano. Minutes away from UBC, maximum 10-15 minutes depending on the time of day, or only a mere 5 Km to the Downtown core of Vancouver. Buses are frequent about every 5 minutes and are right at your doorstep. The 9,99, and 14 go directly to UBC and also toward Downtown along with the N17,4,7 which are less than a block away. The unit is very conveniently located as its only a short walk to many produce stores such as Safeway,IGA, No Frills and other shopping centers, along with many ethically diverse restaurants including green leaf sushi, the eatery, and many more within a few meters. This is a quiet neighborhood, surrounded by a wide varity of shops and services, parks, forest trails, and features many bars and coffee shops for those who love to socialize or relax. Jericho and kitsilano beach are just around the corner, perfect for the upcoming summer days. <br /> <br />The unit is fully furnished and includes all utilities,full led lighting, wireless high speed internet, cable, and wide screen smart tv, insuite washer and dryer, wide-plank oak flooring, solid quartz counter top, cherry barstools, leather sectional, state of the art stainless steel appliances from panasonic (microwave and Fridge), bosch (dishwasher), and fisker and paykel (gas stove and oven) for those who love to cook and the mess that comes a long with it. <br /> <br />A single secure underground parking space is provided however, there is plenty of free parking just to the side of the building and neighbouring streets. Bike storage and a storage storage space is also provided within the building and is large enough to house almost anything. <br /> <br />Both bedrooms are very close in size, the larger of the two includes an ensuite bathroom with a full bathtub and plenty of cabinet space, while the other features a glass door shower and identical cabinets and counter tops. Both rooms feature a south/southwest facing window providing ample natural light. Within each room there are large closest contining racking systems to help keep all your clothes and items organized a long with a large desk and leather office chair ideal for students. The Kitchen and living space feature an open layout design and are connected to the balcony facing North shote mountain and W Braodway providing a perfect source of indirect sunlight.The balcony also includes a small barbeque and enough space for a 2 lawn chairs. <br /> <br />This unit is great for small families, working professionals, UBC students, or anyone looking to truely experie

item.description: Address: 167 King Street, City of Cambridge, ON, Canada, N2J 0B6 <p>The MARQ at 167 King St. is located on the corner of King Street and Ezra Street in Waterloo, Ontario. There are 5 bedroom units available in a luxury student housing apartment building.  Floor plans feature balconies, spacious kitchens and living rooms, two full bathrooms, and a lot of cupboard and closet space - Suites are professionally cleaned and painted two tone with stylish Swiss laminate flooring and modernly styled cupboard space. item.title: The MARQ Waterloo at 168 King Street North - 5 Bedroom B...
item.address: 168 King Street North, Waterloo, ON, Canada, N2J 0B8
item.description: Address: 168 King Street North, Waterloo, ON, Canada, N2J 0B8 <p>The Marq at 168 King Street North is a 10-storey building with a total of 36 units, thirty-five 5-bedroom suites and one 1-bedroom penthouse suite. </p><p>Most of the suites feature a living room, open kitchen with breakfast bar, five bedrooms each with their own ensuite bathroom, as well, in unit laundry, a fridge, stove, microwave and dishwasher. The penthouse suite also features a balcony. All units are fully furnished with quality furniture and a flat screen television. Common areas include a student lounge with a fireplace and a large screen television, a gym, study room, complimentary wifi on the main floor in the common areas, 35 parking stalls (a mix of underground and surface spots), bike racks, and entrance lobby with vending machines.</p><p>The Marq Waterloo at 168 King Street North which corners King St. N and James St. is conveniently situated across from two other Centurion student housing properties (The Marq at 167 and 173 King Street North). </p><p>This property is located walking distance to both Wilfred Laurier University and the University of Waterloo, but is also on the main bus route with a stop in front of the building.  This community is close to medial offices, banks, bike paths and parks.  King Street North extends into the downtown core, is accessible from the highway and boasts many shops, eateries and access to big box retail establishments.  </p>

item.title: 1 bedroom apartment in Brittania
item.address: Ottawa, ON, Canada, K2B 6X8
item.description: Address: Ottawa, ON, Canada, K2B 6X8 Hi, my girlfriend and I are relocating out of Brittania and are leaving a vacancy in our one bedroom apartment. We like the place a lot, but job circumstances require us to move to South Keys. The apartment is one of three in a smallish building, and our neighbours are all very considerate and awesome people. We're a five minute walk from Quickie, Wal-mart, Metro, Lincoln Fields shopping centre and more. The 16 bus route goes right outside our front door. We have access to a full deck and back yard, and are five minutes away from Mud Lake trails and Brittania Beach. The place was renovated shortly before we moved in, and has a new bathroom sink and kitchen cupboards. There's a walk in closet in th bedroom as well. It's a great little location for a single person or a couple. We are also right next to Regina Elementary School.

item.title: GREAT SUBLET DEAL for April 1st 2015!!! NEW CURRENT PHOTOS
item.address: 2450 Southvale Crescent, Ottawa, ON, Canada, K1B 4L7
item.description: Address: 2450 Southvale Crescent, Ottawa, ON, Canada, K1B 4L7 i am subletting my beautiful, very clean and very well maintained aparment at Avalon Park. The apartment is 1050 a month, $25 for hydro (included in the price) and 45 EXTRA for a parking spot (not included in lprice) that is right outside the back, very close to the building. All on site amenities, gym, very very clean laundry room that you must pay for each cycle. The building is very well maintained and same day repair and services as needed. EVERYTHING in this apartment is NEW. Since december 1st 2014, you have new: <br />-kitchen cabinets and all appliances including dishwasher <br />-all flooring, tile and laminate click flooring <br />-all paint <br />-bathroom shower tile and tub, toilet, cabinets and sinks <br /> <br />these are all the photos im able to post on kijii and i have some more of the hallway and bedroom upon request through email or text. <br /> <br />everything is literally brand new and only a few months old, i have kept good care of this aparmtent and know whoever moves in will be happy to call it home. On google reviews youll see how many success stories there have been in avalon. <br /> <br />The great deal is im giving up my last months rent so youll only be required to pay your first. thats over 1000 dollar savings, and if you want parking that will be included as well. By december 1st of this year you can opt out of the lease, or continue living there while being able to leave any month without having to sublet again. <br /> <br />The building is located near st laurent shopping centres, <br />lots of busses etc. <br /> <br />I will attatch a link to avalon parks website so you can see the original apartments and the UPDATED ones which is what ive rented. The only difference is the layout is somewhat different then what you see in the picture, but it is a much better layout. Ill upload a floor plan of it, but you get a big hallway with lots of closet storage, and a bedroom thats TWICE the size of what you see in the website photos. <br /> <br />This place has been great and im sad to leave it but its perfect for any professional or couple. I will be able to view it asap, mostly during nights but can have my father help out to meet anyone during the day as well. <br /> <br />What will be required of you: <br />-Two pieces of ID <br />-Pay stub or letter from employer <br />-Criminal check ( this is a bonus as it is a very safe building) <br /> <br />Looking forward to hearing from you and hopefully we can move you in by the first! <br />Email, call or text <br /> <br />Cheers! <br /> <br />can leave behind the couch and/or chair and a few other things that are in photos, because ill be throwing them out if not. Wont need them where im going <br /> <

item.title: Bachelor Downtown (Open September 1st) - Dog & Cat Friendly
item.address: 560 Needham Street, Fredericton, NB, Canada, E3B 1P3
item.description: Address: 560 Needham Street, Fredericton, NB, Canada, E3B 1P3 ▪️This Bachelor apartment is located Downtown at 560 Needham Street. It is on the second floor in the middle of the house. It is available for September 1st or possibly earlier. The natural gas heat and hot water are included. $645<br /><br />▪️560 Needham Street is a 5 unit, 2 and a half storey house converted into apartments in the Downtown core of Fredericton. Some of the electrical was upgraded in recent years. The house has a new environmentally friendly hi-efficiency natural gas forced-air furnace from Enbridge Gas New Brunswick. All of the apartments at this location have their natural gas heat, and hot water included. There is plenty of paved parking on the side, and especially at the back of the house. It is on the bus route. The snow removal, and the lawn care maintenance are included.<br /><br />▪️The coin-operated Laundry Room is passcode secured. It is open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week for your convenience. The Laundry Room has 2 GE commercial washers and 2 GE commercial dryers at only a $1.50 each. It is located on the driveway side of 560 Needham Street. The Laundry Room was repainted last summer, and received a new ceramic tile floor 2 years ago.<br /><br />▪️You get a 5 Year Rent Guarantee that your rent will stay the same for 5 years. A lease is required from September 1st, 2015 or earlier until August 31st, 2016. Cats and dogs are allowed at all of our locations for an extra charge. If you choose to bring a cat with you it is $25 per month per cat. If you choose to bring a dog with you it is $45 per month per dog.<br /><br />▪️The Security Deposit is the same as one month's rent. For example, if your rent is $645 then your Security Deposit is $645. We prefer to get all $645 of the Security Deposit up front with the $645 in rent when moving in.<br />or<br />If you need more time you can pay it in halves at $322.50 each month over 2 months at the first of each month with the $645 in rent.<br /><br />▪️Prime Rentals has over a dozen locations around Fredericton including on the hill Uptown, the Downtown core, and the Northside. We have quality bachelor, one, two, and three bedroom apartments in apartment buildings, and houses converted into apartments. We allow dogs, and cats at all of our locations. Prime Rentals has been locally owned and operated for over 40 years.<br /><br />▪️Click on ➡️"View poster's other Ads"⬅️ to see some of our other apartments that are coming up for rent.<br /><br />☎️Call or text Rob any time day or night at 506.471.7777. Leave a detailed message if no answer.<br />✉️You can e-mail me at apartments@live.ca.<br /><br />☎️Call or text John at 506.471.6666. Leave a detailed message

item.description: Address: 9240 213 Street NW, Edmonton, AB, Canada, T5T 4P2 <p>WEBBER GREENS<br /> 9240 213 Street NW, Edmonton, AB T5T 4P2<br /> 780-484-4070<br /> <br /> Brand New Month to Month Apartment Rentals!<br /> <br /> Apply online at http://www.broadstreet.ca or call 1-866-736-8515<br /> <br /> Webber Greens sits on the border of the attractive Lewis Estates community in the West end of Edmonton. Webber Greens offers a home with many conveniences and the natural beauty of parks, lakes and the beautiful Lewis Estates Golf Course.<br />  <br /> SUITES INCLUDE:<br /> In suite laundry & dishwasher<br /> Spacious kitchens<br /> One powered parking stall<br /> Heat and water<br /> Private Balcony<br /> <br /> BUILDING AMENITIES:<br /> Pet friendly* (2 pets maximum, cats and dogs only)<br /> Month-to-month rental agreements<br /> Secure keyless front entrance system<br /> 24/7 live help with Broadstreet Properties’ Client Care Centre<br /> Easy access to Anthony Henday and Stony Plain Road<br /> Close to West Edmonton Mall and Lewis Estates Golf Course<br /> <br /> CLIENT RESPONSIBILITIES:<br /> Power, telephone, cable, internet<br /> Additional parking is $55/month per stall, subject to availability<br /><br /> 860 - 922 Sq Ft, 2 Bedroom Apt - $1495 Rent Per Month<br /> 923 - 971 Sq Ft, 2 Bedroom Apt - $1520 Rent Per Month<br /> $700 Security Deposit<br /> <br /> *Subject to Management approval, a non-refundable Pet Deposit of $500 per pet plus $25 per month is required. item.description: Address: 5612 51 Avenue, Camrose, AB, Canada, T4V 0V9 <p>Welcome! To avenue living's Spruce View Apartments for rent in Camrose.</p><p>Spruce View Apartments are tucked away in a quiet residential neighbourhood on the north side of Camrose. item.description: Address: 35180 DeLair Road, Abbotsford, BC, Canada, V3G 3B4 <p>Delair Court Apartments for rent in Abbotsford provides luxurious apartment living in a friendly and comfortable environment. Our one and two bedroom apartments feature the same tasteful furnishings that can be found in upscale condominiums, including berber carpeting, laminate flooring, quality kitchen cabinets and finishings. Convenience is on your side with in-suite laundry and full size refrigerators, dishwashers and stoves in every suite. Feel safe and secure with underground parking, and enjoy your own in-suite storage as well as your own balcony. Our apartments at Delair Court Apartments are awaiting your arrival.</p><p>Delair Court Apartments is located on Delair Road just east of the Sumas Way interchange with easy access to the Trans-Canada Highway. Those who love the outdoors will enjoy Delair Park, just a short walk away. Church goers will also enjoy a variety of different places of worship also within walking distance. Shopping is made easy with many great shopping outlets only a few minutes away by car. item.description: Address: Toronto, ON, Canada, M2R 3N8 <p>Forest Lane offers spacious two bedroom + den apartments for rent in North York. Contact our Rental Consultants today to book your free private tour!</p><p>Forest Lane is located at Steeles Avenue West and Bathurst Street in a quiet North York residential community. This condo-quality apartment complex overlooks scenic parklands and it is minutes away from schools, playgrounds, supermarkets, and the Humber River Finch Site Hospital & Branson Urgent Care Centre. It is ideal for both families and urban professionals seeking a retreat from the hectic pace of the city.</p><p>The rent includes all utilities (heat and water) with the exception of hydroelectricity which is separately metered.</p><p>Residents of Forest Lane Apartments enjoy direct access to the TTC and the neighbourhood features walking or jogging trails and a community playground. item.title: 12 Bridgeport - STUDENTS! Walk to Uptown + WLU. BIG rooms. -...
item.address: 12 Bridgeport Road, Kitchener, ON, Canada, N2J 2J3
item.description: Address: 12 Bridgeport Road, Kitchener, ON, Canada, N2J 2J3 <p>Student focused rental. Spacious 5 bedroom loft.  Price listed is average if split equally between 5 people. . Utilities inlcuded. BIG room. </p><br /><br />Building Overview<br /><p>Address: 12 Bridgeport Road E. Waterloo, Ontario N2J 2J3 - The Bridgeport Loft Building. This is a unique approximately 24 unit loft building - and one of the only true loft buildings in Waterloo that focus on the student renter market - and it features unique and cool loft decor with some units containing high ceilings, big windows, and exposed brick work. The entire building was rebuilt approximately 2002 from an approximately 100 year old factor and the top floor was built new.  Enjoy unique one of a kind in suite finishes with modern mechanical systems in a building with a charming historical exterior. <br /><br />Unit 17 is for rent with a start date of May 2015 - A minimum 12 month commitment is required.<br />One parking space and Utilities (gas/ water/ hydro/ heat/ water heater) are included FREE in rent<br />Rent is $2695 per month (this is an average of $539 per person if splitting rent equally between five people)</p><p>This is spacious five bedroom two washroom loft with space spread over two top floor levels.<br />All bedrooms are large and feature built in desks. Two bedrooms share a semi-ensuite washroom. While all bedrooms are spacious, one of the bedrooms is so large it can easily fit a large a bed, desk, dresser, couch, and TV.<br />This is one of the larger lofts in the building and features a HUGE open concept kitchen / living / dining room easily double the space of many places!  <br />This loft has many recent updates including as of December 2014 new paint and wood-look flooring in many places. </p><p>Your home is thoroughly and professionally cleaned for you prior to move in. Landlord might consider minor changes to the unit to help you live there and we will add anything we agree to on to a lease for you. Let us know what you would like to get signed on and we can discuss.</p><p>Amenities:</p>Security is here! Individual key lock on all bedrooms. Two bathroom unit – both have showers. Shared laundry is coin operated in the building!  Common area bike storage room and lounge room equipped with big screen TV, Foosball table and couches are available for you in the building. Enjoy easy, hassle free living with snow clearing, grass cutting, and landscaping all done for renters by the property owner!  Enjoy worry free renting! We have workers available for you 24 hours a day, 7 days a week for emergency maintenance assistance.<p>â€‹To view the floor plan, dimensions, and 360 degree photos of all rooms, click here: http://www.walk-inside.com/17_12_bridgeport_rd_e_w

item.title: 32 Noecker - STUDENTS! Rent by room - Immediate to September!...
item.address: 32 Noecker Street, Waterloo, ON, Canada, N2J 2R4
item.description: Address: 32 Noecker Street, Waterloo, ON, Canada, N2J 2R4 <p>Top quality space for cheap. An easy walk to uptown Waterloo and WLU!  Each unit has a large living room, large kitchen, five bedrooms, and two washroom; one bathroom includes a shower and tub, and the other bathroom comes with a sink and toilet. Each unit has its own laundry and it's free.  Each bedroom comes with individual locks. This room can come furnished or unfurnished depending on your preference for a small amount extra. At time of lease signing desks are available for $15 per month and beds (includes frame and mattress or box spring and mattress - double size) - for $25 per month.</p><p>Start Date: Immediate up to September start dates available as renter prefers. We are flexible on end dates prior to August 2015. For September 2015 start dates we require a minimum 12 month commitment.</p><p>Address: 32 Noecker Street, Waterloo, ON, N2J 2R4 <br />Unit "A"- Lowest level – Bedroom 1, 2, 3, and 5 are available for rent<br />Unit "B" – Middle level - Bedroom 1 is available for rent<br />Unit "C" – Top level – Bedroom 1 and 5 are available for rent<br />Both males and females are welcome to rent in all units.</p><p>Number of Tenants: We are looking to rent</p><p>Price:  Rent is $409 per person per month for unit A. Rent is $419 per person per month for unit B and unit C. Electricity and heat (electric) is extra and to be paid by renters. Water and water heater are included free in rent. Internet, cable, and phone are not included in rent. However, these services may be ordered by renter as they prefer. Renter can split the proportionate costs with roommates upon agreement with them.</p><p>Amenities: </p>All units are thoroughly and professionally cleaned prior to occupancy. CLEAN building and easy to keep clean – All units are carpet free! Nice grass front yard and parking lot in backyard allows for parking.  Dishwasher, fridge, stove, washer, and dryer are all included in each unit! Save money and time (no need to find coins!) with FREE laundry facilities (washer and dryer) are available in each unit. Enjoy hassle free living as snow clearing, grass cutting, and landscaping is included in rent and done for you by the property owner! We have workers available for you 24 hours a day, 7 days a week for emergency maintenance assistance if ever needed<p>To view the floor plans, dimensions, and 360 degrees photos of a unit in the building click here :<br />Unit A – Lowest level<br />Unit B – Middle level<br />Unit C – Top level</p><p>â€‹Contact Information: Please contact Hoffaco Property Management to arrange to view this property in person or answer any of your questions a twww.hoffaco.com - rent@hoffaco.com - 519-885-7910. Please include your phone number and address

item.description: Address: 10 Overlea Drive, Kitchener, ON, Canada, N2M 5C8 Apartment for Rent in Kitchener<br />Key Property Details<br />Beautiful upgraded suites, UTILITIES INCLUDED!Outdoor pool and BBQ area!Laundry room and covered parking!<br />Property Features<br />BalconyCable ReadyElevatorFridge / StoveLaundry RoomParkingPetsPoolUtilities Included<br />Detailed Property Information<br />Realstar’s Capitol Hill I and II Apartments combine elegant-style living with a family-friendly, quiet community life. <br /><br /> Our beautiful high-rise towers provides outstanding views of the nearby parks while offering quick access to everything Kitchener has to offer. <br /><br /> Some of the quality, newly renovated suite has a large layout and a private balcony or patio, perfect for entertaining friends and family or watching the sunset. Our lovely suites also feature new plush carpeting or hardwood flooring and some come with dishwashers. Capitol Hill residents enjoy our seasonal outdoor swimming pool and access to nearby parks, which include play sets. Additionally, we feature covered and surface parking. <br /><br /> A large laundry room is located on the main floor, as is a community patio with a BBQ and our recently renovated lobby area. <br /><br /> Capitol Hill I and II Apartments are centrally located within walking distance of all major amenities. Queensmount Public School is directly behind the building, making this the perfect place for families. Our great neighbourhood is also home to several other schools, religious centres, daycares, recreational centres, hospitals and libraries. Osborne Village’s early 1900’s architecture, which stands along the modern high rises of Winnipeg, adds visually interesting views to the already exciting community.</p><p>This newly renovated condo includes:</p><p>Brand new stainless steel appliances</p><p>River facing view</p><p>Balcony</p><p>Storage space</p><p>Air conditioning</p><p>Central Vac</p><p>In-suite laundry</p><p>New window coverings</p><p>Town House Features:</p><p>Private entrance</p><p>Heated indoor parking and outdoor parking</p><p>On-site manager</p><p>Courtyard</p><p>Within walking distance of all major bus routes</p><p>Along the banks of the Assiniboine River</p><p>Within 20 minutes of Downtown Winnipeg, St. Boniface Hospital, and The <br /> University of Winnipeg</p><p>*Non-Smoking Building*<br /> *No Pets Allowed*</p><p>For more information, or to book a viewing:<br /> Call Sue Ede at 204-452-6481 from Monday to Friday between 9am-5pm<br /> or Call the resident property manager at 204-229-5913 during the evening and weekends</p>

item.title: The Plaza at Halifax Apartments
item.address: Halifax Regional Municipality, NS, Canada, B3J 3L8
item.description: Address: Halifax Regional Municipality, NS, Canada, B3J 3L8 Apartment for Rent in Halifax<br />Key Property Details<br />At the Heart of the Harbour District!Heated Indoor Swimming Pool, Sauna, & Fitness Centre!Fully Furnished Suites AvailableProperty Features<br />Air ConditioningBalconyCable ReadyElevatorFitness CenterFridge / StoveLaundry RoomOn Site ManagementParkingPoolSaunaSecurity CamerasSecurity PatrolsStorageWasher / DryerDetailed Property Information<br />From the heart of the city’s most sought-after district, everything downtown Halifax has to offer is within easy walking distance of Halifax Apartments —a cluster of three quality rental apartments at the heart of the Harbour district. <br /><br /> Sizes range from one-bedroom to three-bedroom suites. Fully furnished suites are available at The Plaza. <br /><br /> Halifax Apartments offers appealing amenities like an indoor swimming pool, hot tub and sauna, a fully equipped fitness centre, mini mart, gourmet gift shop, business centre and a pizzeria, as well as direct indoor access to the pedway. <br /><br /> Natural light streams in through the glass enclosure around the indoor pool. Get in a workout, or just splash around to relax and re-energize. To take your relaxation one step further, try the sauna or the whirlpool. <br /><br /> The fitness centre has everything you need to stay in shape—weights, treadmills, elliptical machines, stationary bikes and more. Lockers and showers are available. <br /><br /> Spend the afternoon in your favourite lawn chair on the deck, or catch the sunset over the Harbour. <br /><br />The Halifax Harbour area is the cultural centre of this lively city, and Halifax Apartments is at its heart, making it easy for you to take full advantage of this ideal location. Restaurants to suit all tastes and budgets, museums, historic sites, markets and shopping—even a casino—are all within a few minutes’ walk. The sun and salt air, the fresh breezes, the boardwalk, the nearby beaches: the sights and sounds of this vibrant district will fill your senses. <br /><br />Additional Property Information<br />PoolWhirlpoolSaunaFitness centreRooftop deck and patioUnderground parkingSecurity system and regular building patrols are a reassuring presenceStaff are on call 24 hours a day to respond to residents’ needsAir conditioningIn-suite laundryPropane fireplacesPrivate balconiesHardwood and vinyl tile flooringAmple storage areasBalcony or PatioClose to Public TransitClose to Shopping

item.description: Address: 190 Smith Street, Manitoba, MB, Canada, R3C 1J8 <p><strong>VIBRANT LIVING</strong><br /> <br /> A perfect location with amazing views and, soon to be, a collection of amenities to really leverage your lifestyle. Your new home is located just steps away from Winnipeg’s top destinations such as The Forks, City Place Shopping Centre, MTS Sports & Entertainment Centre, the Canadian Museum for Human Rights, University of Winnipeg and much, much more! Live it all at Antares. <strong><em>A remarkable lifestyle.</em></strong></p> <p> </p> <p><strong>LUXURIOUS FEATURES</strong></p> <ul> <li>Premium condo-quality finishes</li> <li>Pet-friendly</li> <li>Downtown Winnipeg’s <strong><em>FASTEST</em></strong> high-speed internet wired rental building</li> <li>Air conditioning</li> <li>Heat, water and hydro included</li> <li>On-site management</li> <li>Resident and guest parking available</li> <li>Suite window treatments include black-out shades and lavish drapery and valances</li> <li>Keyless suite and building access</li> <li>Secure entrance</li> <li>Espresso stained wood cabinets & granite countertops</li> <li>Soaker tubs & rain showerheads</li> <li>Black & stainless steel appliances</li> <li>Fridge, stove, dishwasher & microwave</li> </ul> <p> </p> <p><strong>COMING SOON:</strong></p> <ul> <li>Internet café with high speed WIFI access</li> <li>Extensive, club-quality fitness centre</li> <li>Resident’s lounge & activity room complete with chef’s kitchen and HDTV screens</li> <li>Business centre & meeting rooms</li> <li>Bike & storage lockers</li> </ul> <p> </p>
